title: Fuel crisis
brief_description: The end of the petrol shortages and the promise of North Sea oil have led many people to believe that the crisis is over. The film shatters that illusion. Forecasts sizeable and increasing energy shortages for the 1980’s which could have traumatic political and economic effects on society
